message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our unique product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $12000. This is an opportunity to acquire a piece worth more than $10000 at a competitive price. Please let us know if this offer meets your expectations.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and my budget. Let me know if this is something you're willing to consider.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. While we appreciate your offer, we need to maintain our pricing strategy to ensure the value of our products remains intact. We are willing to negotiate further and propose a price of $10500 for the product. We believe this is a fair compromise given the value of the product and your budget. Please let us know if this proposal works for you.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking to stay within my budget of $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10250 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable compromise considering the value of the product and my budget. Let me know if this is something you're willing to consider.

Dear Bob, thank you for your continued interest in our product. After careful consideration, we have decided to adjust our offer slightly. We are now proposing a price of $10000 for the product. We believe this is a fair compromise that respects both the value of the product and your budget. We hope this proposal will be acceptable to you. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do to facilitate the purchase.
